casebody.data:
CLINTON S.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2017

Vishal K. Garg, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Marjorie Allen Dauster, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Clinton S.' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 821, 167 A.3d 389 (2017), is denied.
